catalog_script_client.name: คำนวณ Hours , Price

sys_update_version.name: catalog_script_client_7d607a1247c5f11021f49128436d431f
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Car parking reservation">f64205c54709711021f49128436d433a</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:01c6e0394701711021f49128436d4328</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>คำนวณ Hours , Price</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
    if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
        return;
    }

    var st = g_form.getValue('u_start_dt');
    var end = g_form.getValue('u_end_dt');

    var call1 = new GlideAjax('Calculate_price');
    call1.addParam('sysparm_name','cal_hours');
    call1.addParam('st_dt', st);
    call1.addParam('ed_dt', end);
    call1.getXML(getResponse);

    function getResponse(response) {
        var result = response.responseXML.documentElement.getAttribute('answer');
		var price;
		if(result != "error"){ 
			alert(result);
			g_form.setValue('u_hours',parseInt(result) + " ชั่วโมง");
			if(result == 1){
				price = 5;
				g_form.setValue('u_price',price + " บาท");
			}else if(result <= 4){
				price = result * 10;
				g_form.setValue('u_price',price + " บาท");
			}else if(result <= 10){
				price = result * 15;
				g_form.setValue('u_price',price + " บาท");
			}
		}else{
			alert("ER");
		}
    }

}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-09-05 13:56:21</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>7d607a1247c5f11021f49128436d431f</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>คำนวณ Hours , Price</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Car parking reservation" source="x_950909_car_park">083c1ad84741311021f49128436d4349</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Car parking reservation">083c1ad84741311021f49128436d4349</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_7d607a1247c5f11021f49128436d431f</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-09-05 13:57:26</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
